languages.text: "Ты прав{mf||а}, элантах. В путь. Вырвем их жизни из лап ненасытных кузенов". {n}Эльдарка обращает лицо к вам, и уголки ее напряженных губ едва заметно приподнимаются.{/n} "Интересно, в туманных видениях того, чему было только суждено случиться, узрел ли хоть один из провидцев будущее, в котором ключом к его спасению становится дуэт из мон-кай и изгоя?"

traits.locale_text: "Ты прав{mf||а}, эл'антар. В путь. Вырвем их жизни из лап ненасытных кузенов". {n}Эльдарка обращает лицо к вам, и уголки ее напряженных губ едва заметно приподнимаются.{/n} "Интересно, в туманных видениях того, чему было только суждено случиться, узрел ли хоть один из провидцев будущее, в котором ключом к его спасению становится дуэт из мон-кай и изгоя?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "You speak the truth, elantach. Let us be on our way. We will tear their lives from the clutches of my insatiable cousins." {n}She turns her face to you and, despite her tense expression, you see the corners of her mouth twitch.{/n} "I find myself wondering if a single Farseer, gazing at the hazy visions of things yet to come, ever glimpsed a future where the key to their salvation stemmed from the duo of a mon-keigh and an Outcast."
languages.original_text: "Ты прав{mf||а}, элантах. В путь. languages.text: « Vous avez raison, elantach. Mettons-nous en route. Nous sauverons les Grands Prophètes des griffes de mes cousins insatiables. » {n}Elle se tourne vers vous et, malgré sa mine tendue, vous apercevez un léger frémissement aux commissures de ses lèvres.{/n} « Je me demande si un seul Grand Prophète, contemplant les visions incertaines des événements à venir, a envisagé un avenir dans lequel la clé de son salut résiderait dans l'association d'{mf|un|une} mon-keigh et d'une Errante. »
languages.original_text: "You speak the truth, elantach. Let us be on our way. We will tear their lives from the clutches of my insatiable cousins." {n}She turns her face to you and, despite her tense expression, you see the corners of her mouth twitch.{/n} "I find myself wondering if a single Farseer, gazing at the hazy visions of things yet to come, ever glimpsed a future where the key to their salvation stemmed from the duo of a mon-keigh and an Outcast."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez raison, elantach. Mettons-nous en route. Nous sauverons les Grands Prophètes des griffes de mes cousins insatiables. » {n}Elle se tourne vers vous et, malgré sa mine tendue, vous apercevez un léger frémissement aux commissures de ses lèvres.{/n} « Je me demande si un seul Grand Prophète, contemplant les visions incertaines des événements à venir, a envisagé un avenir dans lequel la clé de son salut résiderait dans l'association d'{mf|un|une} mon-keigh et d'une Errante. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “你说得没错，外界人，我们出发吧。我们要制止那些贪得无厌的黑暗子嗣，从他们手中救回我的兄弟姐妹。”{n}她转向了你。尽管她的表情很紧张，但你看到她的嘴角微微扬了起来。{/n}“我不禁在想，不知会不会有哪位先知瞥见未来的朦胧景象时，预见到自己会落得这样的下场。而拯救他们的两个关键人物，居然会是猴子和流浪者。”
languages.original_text: "You speak the truth, elantach. Let us be on our way. We will tear their lives from the clutches of my insatiable cousins." {n}She turns her face to you and, despite her tense expression, you see the corners of her mouth twitch.{/n} "I find myself wondering if a single Farseer, gazing at the hazy visions of things yet to come, ever glimpsed a future where the key to their salvation stemmed from the duo of a mon-keigh and an Outcast."

traits.locale_text: “你说得没错，外界人，我们出发吧。我们要制止那些贪得无厌的黑暗子嗣，从他们手中救回我的族人。”{n}她转向了你。尽管她的表情很紧张，但你看到她的嘴角微微扬了起来。{/n}“我不禁在想，不知会不会有哪位先知在凝视未来的朦胧景象时，预见到自己会落得这样的下场。而拯救他们的两个关键人物，竟会是猴子和流浪者。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたの言う通りだ、エランタ。さあ行こう。我が貪欲ないとこたちの支配から、彼らの命を解放するのだ」{n}あなたに向いた彼女の顔は、その緊張した表情とは裏腹に、口元がかすかに動くのが見える。{/n}「未来をおぼろげながらも見通せる先見司たちの中に、救いの鍵が一人のモン＝ケイと一人の追放者からもたらされるなどと予見できた者が一人でもいただろうか」
languages.original_text: "You speak the truth, elantach. Let us be on our way. We will tear their lives from the clutches of my insatiable cousins." {n}She turns her face to you and, despite her tense expression, you see the corners of her mouth twitch.{/n} "I find myself wondering if a single Farseer, gazing at the hazy visions of things yet to come, ever glimpsed a future where the key to their salvation stemmed from the duo of a mon-keigh and an Outcast."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの言う通りだ、エランタ。さあ行こう。我が貪欲ないとこたちの支配から、彼らの命を解放するのだ」{n}あなたに向いた彼女の顔は、その緊張した表情とは裏腹に、口元がかすかに動くのが見える。{/n}「未来をおぼろげながらも見通せる先見司たちの中に、救いの鍵が一人のモン＝ケイと一人の追放者からもたらされるなどと予見できた者が一人でもいただろうか」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr sagt die Wahrheit, Elantach. Lasst uns weitergehen. Wir werden die Runenpropheten den Klauen meiner unersättlichen Verwandten entreißen." {n}Sie wendet sich dir zu und trotz ihrer angespannten Miene zucken ihre Mundwinkel.{/n} "Ob wohl jemals ein Runenprophet die verschwommene Vision einer Zukunft hatte, in der er mit Hilfe {mf|eines|einer} Chem-Pan-Sey und einer Ausgestoßenen seine Erlösung finden würde?"
languages.original_text: "You speak the truth, elantach. Let us be on our way. We will tear their lives from the clutches of my insatiable cousins." {n}She turns her face to you and, despite her tense expression, you see the corners of her mouth twitch.{/n} "I find myself wondering if a single Farseer, gazing at the hazy visions of things yet to come, ever glimpsed a future where the key to their salvation stemmed from the duo of a mon-keigh and an Outcast."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr sagt die Wahrheit, Elantach. Lasst uns weitergehen. Wir werden die Runenpropheten den Klauen meiner unersättlichen Art entreißen." {n}Sie wendet sich dir zu und trotz ihrer angespannten Miene zucken ihre Mundwinkel.{/n} "Ich frage mich wirklich, ob es jemals einen Runenpropheten mit der verschwommenen Vision einer Zukunft gab, in der sie mit Hilfe {mf|eines|einer} Chem-Pan-Sey und einer Ausgestoßenen ihre Erlösung finden würden."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Dices la verdad, elantach. Pongámonos en marcha. Los rescataremos de las garras de mis insaciables primos». {n}Vuelve la cara hacia ti y, a pesar de su expresión endurecida, ves que las comisuras de sus labios se contraen.{/n} «Me pregunto si un solo vidente, al contemplar las nebulosas visiones del porvenir, habrá llegado a vislumbrar un futuro en el que su salvación depende de una pareja formada por {mf|un|una} mon-keigh y una proscrita».
languages.original_text: "You speak the truth, elantach. Let us be on our way. We will tear their lives from the clutches of my insatiable cousins." {n}She turns her face to you and, despite her tense expression, you see the corners of her mouth twitch.{/n} "I find myself wondering if a single Farseer, gazing at the hazy visions of things yet to come, ever glimpsed a future where the key to their salvation stemmed from the duo of a mon-keigh and an Outcast."

traits.locale_text: «Dices la verdad, elantach. Pongámonos en marcha. Los rescataremos de las garras de mis insaciables parientes». {n}Vuelve la cara hacia ti y, a pesar de su expresión endurecida, ves que las comisuras de sus labios se contraen.{/n} «Me pregunto si un solo vidente, al contemplar las nebulosas visiones del porvenir, habrá llegado a vislumbrar un futuro en el que su salvación depende de una pareja formada por {mf|un|una} mon-keigh y una proscrita».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Doğruyu söylüyorsun elantach. Yola koyulalım. Canlarını, doyumsuz akrabalarımın pençesinden kurtaralım." {n}Yüzünü sana doğru dönüyor, gergin yüz ifadesine rağmen dudaklarının kenarındaki kıpırtıyı görebiliyorsun.{/n} "Merak ediyorum da... Henüz gerçekleşmemiş şeylere dair puslu görülere bakış atan Ötesezenler arasında, kurtuluşlarının anahtarını bir mon-keigh ile bir Yurtsuz'un taşıdığı bir geleceği gören tek bir kişi olmuş mudur?"
languages.original_text: "You speak the truth, elantach. Let us be on our way. We will tear their lives from the clutches of my insatiable cousins." {n}She turns her face to you and, despite her tense expression, you see the corners of her mouth twitch.{/n} "I find myself wondering if a single Farseer, gazing at the hazy visions of things yet to come, ever glimpsed a future where the key to their salvation stemmed from the duo of a mon-keigh and an Outcast."

traits.locale_text: "Doğruyu söylüyorsun elantach. Yola koyulalım. Yaşamlarını doyumsuz kuzenlerimin pençesinden kurtaracağız." {n}Yüzünü sana doğru dönüyor ve gergin yüz ifadesine rağmen dudaklarının kenarındaki kıpırtıyı görebiliyorsun.{/n} "Merak ediyorum da, henüz gerçekleşmemiş şeylerin puslu görülerine bakış atan Ötesezenler içinde, kurtuluşlarının anahtarını bir mon-keigh ve bir Yurtsuz'un taşıdığı bir geleceği gören tek bir kişi var mıdır?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
